name: Summer Puzzle Free
description:
Summer Puzzle is a free Android jigsaw puzzle with Summer themed pictures that will always bring back the heat of the summer days. Just pick a picture from the gallery, your difficulty level and enjoy.
Our gallery is divided into categories with pictures which will remind you of the sunny days, waves, beaches, landscapes that can take you back to one of the most favourite seasons. Take your flip-flops, put some sunscreen cream and pick a beach to place your memories on.
If you have pictures from your summer vacation or you can't find your picture in our selection, pick one from your device or take a picture with your camera and turn it into a jigsaw puzzle to play with.
As soon as you are done with the pieces you can share your result with your friends or challenge someone else to solve it faster. Set the picture as a wallpaper to have it on display and keep the summer mood on your device.

Some of the puzzle features include:
* It is not required to have internet access to play the puzzle game (works in offline mode)
* Many nice high definition pictures sorted in a gallery
* Lots of difficulty levels
* Smooth game-play. (Uses the hardware acceleration of the device.)
* Game timer.
* Share result/picture.
* Multitouch zoom and piece rotation
* Zoom In / Out.
* Piece rotation.
* Save game option.
* Best score statistics.
* Set picture as wallpaper.
* Nice background nature music.
* Magical sound effects.
* Vibration on piece merge.
* The jigsaw puzzle is free.
* Kids mode
...and a lot of fun for every puzzle lover.
